main event: Multiple unidentified bright colored objects were observed in the sky near Ft. McMurray, Alberta, Canada. The objects were described as very red and dim in color, hovering and making rapid movements. A separate sighting described a circular, silver object hovering over the city and then shooting up at a terrific speed.
interesting points: The objects were bright orange and silver in color with pulsating lights and made no sound.
No evidence of a threat to national security was found in this incident.
The witness who observed the circular, silver object was a former pilot in the RCAF and civil aviation.
The circular object was approximately 40 feet in diameter and 10 feet thick.
The circular object hovered over the city for approximately 4 minutes before shooting straight up at a terrific speed and disappearing from sight.
witnesses: civilian residents, former pilot, charter accountant, town constable, and several other citizens
